thread.title: Marks and Spencer Looks to Double Presence in India
thread.title_full: Marks and Spencer Looks to Double Presence in India - WSJ

author: Saabira Chaudhuri
title: Marks and Spencer Looks to Double Presence in India
text:
LONDONâ€”Marks & Spencer Group PLC said it is on track to double its store count in India in the next 15 months, an ambition that poses both risks and opportunities for the British retailer.
M&S has recently struggled in troubled markets such as Russia, Ukraine and Turkey and was forced to reconfigure its footprint in China, but India has...
